properties.areaDesc: Alpena; Alcona; Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island; Arenac; Presque Isle; Iosco
properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued January 10 at 3:10PM EST until January 12 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Presque Isle, Alpena, Alcona, Iosco, Arenac and
Mackinac Island/Bois Blanc Island Counties.

* WHEN...From 1 AM Saturday to 7 AM EST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including
parking lots, lawns, and homes and businesses could be inundated
near the lake. Some shoreline erosion will occur.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty northerly winds develop tonight and
turn more northeast and further increase Saturday afternoon and
Saturday night.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM SATURDAY TO 7 AM EST SUNDAY
